Content: Deputy Minister NalinBandara has said that the United National Party had the best candidate to triumph in a Presidential election. The Deputy Minister made this reference at a gathering of party supporters in the Horuthapola area in Bingiriya. Among those who joined in the occasion was a group of United National Party activitsts including the UdubaddawaPradeshiya Sabha member Chaminda Pradeep Kumara. The Deputy Minister said that they had the candidate that could be victorious at the Presidential election. If SajithPremadasa is fielded no one can contest with him. Some are referring to Gotabhaya Rajapaksa, Basil Rajapaksa and Chamal Rajapaksa. None of them has a recognition in the village. He said that ninety nine percent of the Party believe that they should field the candidate that could win in the main election. He said that they should win the presidential election and then triumph in the General Election as well as in the Provincial Council polls and acquire all of them.
